field.name: summary
field.value: Incorrect parameter order for logger.ErrorFormat and logger.FatalFormat calls in Controller

field.name: description
field.value:
There are a couple of places in Controller where the Format versions of the logging methods are called and the exception is passed as the last argument instead of the first (causing it to be treated as a parameter for the formatted string). Since the format strings do not contain any placeholders, the exception information is not written to the log.
Since neither instance (lines 2069 and 2221 as of revision 5307) actually uses placeholders, the easiest fix should be to replace the calls to ErrorFormat() and FatalFormat() with Error() and Fatal().
